Feedback content: I can't update contact profile information during a call
I would like to know how to sort the items on the customer information page
It is troublesome to copy email addresses on the prohibited list and search them in the customer information list.
It would be nice to be able to sort by the number of web views
When communication with a contact it's cumbersome to have to scroll to find a specific information
I would like to be able to register multiple email addresses on the customer profile screen.
I would like to be able to use custom fields in SMS placeholder fields.
I want to make RealView easier to operate when I go out.
I want to notice and reply to SMS replies from RealView in real time from my mobile phone.
I want to be able to enter events into a schedule and share it with other users
I also want to use RealView to manage my schedule.
I want the ability to print customer information displayed in RealView's contact profile pages.
I want to easily understand which Sale automation is currently running.
I want to check RealView even when I go out.
I want to be able to check the delivery status of an email
I would like to be able to search for emails in the mailbox list.
When I receive a notification such as a reply while on the move I want to respond immediately on the spot.
I want to make the RealView easier to view on my mobile phone. I want to make it easier to operate.
Hard to see on smartphone
I often miss important notification because I am often out and can't check the RealView webapp
